White Haven Service Night

10
0zymandius
Wednesday, July 26th, 2017, 10:39:18 AM

Tonight (and every Wednesday night) House White Haven will be sponsoring their weekly Service Night. Come on by and get spells, lockpicking, loresinging, and whatever else we can provide. Plus plenty of good fun, and with a little luck, some attendee will walk away with a few extra coins in their pocket!

Event runs from 930-1030 EST in the White Haven Courtyard.
